TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, he will come back after KSP 2 releases.(regardless though, i also miss him)

I wish to end this, for the order of Inamorta!

Not granted 

I wish for a computer that’s can run ksp and HUNDREDS OF MODS without lag

Your able to run ksp with mods and without lag but its locked at 0.1 fps.

I wish for wishes to wish wishes.

Let me wish it for you.

I wish MS Office 2003 was not the very last professionally looking, full-featured, handy, and comfy office software in this planet history, like it is being right now.

Granted.  The next professionally looking, full-featured, handy, and comfy office software in this planet history is released the day after you die.

I wish Windows ME was the dominant operating system.

Granted. You have no access to another one.

I wish ZX Spectrums were still popular.

Granted, he came back once, never to return...

I wish to laugh

Granted. Your room is flooded with nitrous oxide.

I wish no one will feel Schadenfreude from K.P.'s hilariously fiendish fate.

Edited January 6, 2022 by Exploro
Bro... no, I won't grant this

U BROKE THE RULES~!q!~!~q!Q`1

I wish more Reinforcements on LMO.

Granted, all of your Reinforcements are ants

I wish for a orion drive

Granted, it's a 3D model display. At least it's an orion drive right?

I wish for humanity to have contact with aliens

Granted. Humanity has contact with aliens, but to borrow a phrase from Nuke's Top 5, what happened next is down right chilling.

I wish to be able to see this prospective scenario on the big screen.

Granted.  Independence Day is still a terrible movie, no matter what screen you watch it on.

I wish to be a goldfish, swimming in a bowl.

Wake up! Now! 
And get dry.

I wish to know the Sumerian programming language.

Granted, you give up 20 minutes later.

I wish  I didn't forget to make a wish

Granted: You realise you didn't forget but did it on purpose.

I wish that procrastination meant motivated.

OK, but there's no time for you to motivate.

I wish Dres to be more interesting.

Granted, wait for KSP2.

I wish we had a trampoline park on the moon.

Granted. Unfortunately, you bounce so high, you go out of the Moon's SOI.

I wish that everyone tried to control the spread of Covid

Granted. Now everyone has a covid spray to controllably spread it.

I wish the classic medieval masks were treated as covid masks.

Granted, but they are like Kerbin: they attract COVID and it falls on you!

I wish bob stuck his tongue in the science experiment (is the Antarctic ice liquor?).

Granted, they never helped him after.

I wish to be awake

Granted. You are awake when you next get on.

I wish that I had some candy.

Granted.  You get beaten up by the father of the baby you took it from.

I wish that I was a transformer.
